desc: CrabbieMasters children's picture book series is based on the social-emotional learning program created by Becky Undlin for use in her preschool. The imaginary fun creates real results as children and adults work together to learn how to manage the inevitable ups and downs of everyday life.

layout.text: CrabbieMasters is a social-emotional learning book series that uses imaginary fun to teach children how to manage the inevitable ups and downs of everyday life.
